intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) serves as a comprehensive guide for users of the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Urban Atlas Building Block Height Model (UA BBHM). It details the UA BBHM product, which provides harmonised building height data for 870 cities and urban centres within the EEA38 region. The document outlines the product's scope, methodology, and potential applications, providing users with essential information for understanding the dataset’s characteristics, quality assessment procedures, and utilisation in various urban analysis and policy support contexts.
keywords: Urban Atlas Land Cover/Land Use classes
